rules_text: If {B} was spent to cast this spell, mill three cards. If {G} was spent to cast this spell, mill three cards. Then return any number of creature cards with total mana value 6 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: [i]“I have sworn my loyalty to the emperor. I will cleanse these lands in her name even if it costs me my head.”[/i]
